title: Domenic Figliomeni
text:
Domenic Filane Figliomeni (born March 17, 1969 in <a href="Terrace%20Bay%2C%20Ontario">Terrace Bay, Ontario</a>) is a former <a href="boxing">boxer</a> from <a href="Canada">Canada</a>, who competed for his native country at two consecutive <a href="Summer%20Olympics">Summer Olympics</a>, starting in <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201992%20Summer%20Olympics">1992</a>.
<a href="Nickname">Nickname</a>d "Hollywood", he was Canadian Boxing Champion from 1990 to 1999 in the Light Flyweight Division (48 kg), and twice won the bronze medal at the <a href="Commonwealth%20Games">Commonwealth Games</a>: in <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201990%20Commonwealth%20Games">1990</a> and <a href="1994%20Commonwealth%20Games">1994</a>. After his boxing career he started a boxing training center in <a href="Schreiber%2C%20Ontario">Schreiber, Ontario</a>.
